>
[Hat of the Magi](/Equipment.aspx?ID=443)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Arcane" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=11" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 611 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn headwear

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This hat comes in many forms, such as a colorful turban or a pointy hat with a brim, and can bear symbols or runes. It grants you a +1 item bonus to Arcana checks and allows you to cast the [_prestidigitation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=229) cantrip as an arcane innate spell.

</column>

</row>

</column>

---

This larger, fancier hat grants a +2 bonus and can be activated.
